original_text:
Oh, that my head were a spring of water
    and my eyes a fountain of tears!
I would weep day and night
    for the slain of my people.
korean_text: 어찌하면 내 머리는 물이 되고 내 눈은 눈물 근원이 될꼬 죽임을 당한 딸 내 백성을 위하여 주야로 울리로다

sentences.original_text: Oh, that my head were a spring of water
sentences.korean_translation: 아, 내 머리가 물의 샘이 되었더라면

sentences.original_text: and my eyes a fountain of tears!
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 눈이 눈물의 샘이 되었더라면!

sentences.original_text: I would weep day and night
for the slain of my people.
